post.content:
On account of one dev allegedly posting “tantalizing pedophillic yelp material”

Fallout: The Frontier, an immense mod for Fallout: New Vegas, has been years in development and launched staunch closing week. It has now been taken offline by its possess creators, because one developer is intended to possess “posted tantalizing pedophillic yelp material” on their non-public artist accounts.

Whereas you occur to discuss to the mod’s net page on Nexus Mods, right here’s the message you will seek:

Some deeply regarding knowledge has emerged in the previous few hours. Now we possess been nowadays notified that belief to be one of our developers, ZuTheSkunk, had posted tantalizing pedophillic yelp material on their non-public artist accounts. The items in quiz are deeply annoying to the total team, and we condemn them in the strongest sense. ZuTheSkunk has since been remote from the Pattern Team and banned off of our Neighborhood Discord. We would be conducting dialogue with contributors of the approach team to hear their solutions in the case of the original mutter and lend a hand kind our decision extra instructed. Now we possess stopped production and work on the mod to address the original events successfully. More measures will be undertaken and a extra detailed address will be posted soon.

The views, solutions, and opinions expressed each and each in the mod, and out of doors of it, belong completely to the authors who write them, and to no longer the mod’s group, neighborhood, or other neighborhood or particular particular person.

I’m no longer distinct how “the mod’s group” and any “neighborhood or particular particular person” can claim to be entirely blind to the work “in the mod” made by their fellow groups and folks. Here is essential, because prior to it being taken offline, there had already been criticism of the mod’s yelp material.

Namely, avid gamers had complained about fetishised characters, and one particular quest line whereby the player may perchance well perchance well also enslave a teenage girl. Slavery has been a theme in plenty of official Fallout games, but there may perchance be a incompatibility between depicting it and allowing avid gamers to ride it, as The Frontier looks to.

On Twitter, the mod’s official account acknowledged reiterated their assertion above and added, “We would be making adjustments to the Frontier going forward to take away defective lines and yelp material. This would be our final originate.” It’s a long way no longer but known precisely what yelp material will be removed – nor is it particular that ZuTheSkunk had the leisure to kind with the creation of acknowledged yelp material.

Ugh.
